page.title: 14A morning at Kirkby C.E.
page.content: My name is Jennifer. I am 7 and the class I am in is J1 at Kirkby C.E. We start school at 8.50 when we mark the register and only 2 people were off today. After that we went into Assembly which was taken by the Head Teacher who told us all about people who help us. Following that we went back to the classroom for Maths. It was all about factors. At 10.30 it is playtime and in the Hall some children from the top class sell crisps and biscuits. After play we had Science and we are learning all about the human body. I really like Science and today I found out all about lungs. At noon we have lunch but unfortunately the teachers are working to rule so the school is closed at dinner time and this means we have to go out of school for dinner
